course.title: course
course.description: Provides knowledge over an entire subject. It is assumed it will be consumed linearly from start to finish.

tutorial.title: tutorial
tutorial.description: Helps solving a specific challenge. It is focused on demonstrating how to reach a specific goal.

guide.title: guide
guide.description: Investigates on a narrow subject. It is scoped over a specific aspect of a larger topic.

book.title: book
book.description: Provides knowledge over an entire subject. It is designed to be consumed as a printed work would.

example.title: example
example.description: Showcases an executed project and allows to take a look at its source.

collection.title: collection
collection.description: Group of resources. Those can vary in type and organization.

reference.title: reference
reference.description: Helps when a quick refresher is needed or to rely on its updates to stay current.

community.title: community
community.description: Gives insights on a niche or helps getting in contact with it. Not everything is about skills.

exercise.title: exercise
exercise.description: Gives the chance to practice with newly acquired skills.

generator.title: generator
generator.description: Utility that could range from a simple value calculator to a complex and feature rich automatic configurator.

opinion.title: opinion
opinion.description: Everybodyâ€™s opinion counts because they could push to look at things from a different perspective.
